batha wenuwata aatha ruhune minisun kiri hattiyak ka wela gewa damu yugayak da wiya. 1977 ta pera lankawe ga්ramiya mattame diyunu kiri nishpadana karmanthayak pawathini.ewakata rate kiri awashyathawa rate nishpadanaya kerini.
ada pawathina china amarika sambdhatha hamuwe wan huning ge mathaya ithama wadagath thanakata pathwa athi athara eya amarikanuwan da salaka balana wishesha thaththwayak bawa dakwima awashyaya.
